name: xwander-context
description: Session management for Claude Code: handoffs, checkpoints, context externalization, token optimization

skills.name: session-handoff
skills.description: Prepare context for session continuation or handoff. Use before ending sessions or when approaching compaction.

skills.name: checkpoint-optimizer
skills.description: Suggest conversation rewinds after completing work to reclaim context tokens while preserving code.

skills.name: context-externalization
skills.description: Save important context to RAG before compaction. Use for decisions, learnings, and discoveries.

skills.name: token-budget
skills.description: Monitor and optimize token usage. Use when context feels heavy or approaching limits.
